overview: Acclaimed writer and historian Deborah E. Lipstadt must battle for historical truth to prove the Holocaust actually occurred when David Irving, a renowned denier, sues her for libel.
tagline: The whole world knows the Holocaust happened. Now she needs to prove it.
title: Denial

cast.name: Mark Gatiss
cast.character: Professor Robert Jan van der Pelt

actors_characters.character: Professor Robert Jan van der Pelt
